mapper.select: select store_id, storename, tel, address, lineintro, intro, SUBSTR(image, 1, INSTR(image, ' ') - 1) as image, main_menu, main_image, region_name, feature, dessert from registration
select a.store_id, round(sum(b.star)/count(*),2) as star_score, count(*) as review_count from reservation a join review b on a.reservation_num = b.reservation_num group by a.store_id
select store_id, count(*) as waiting_num from waiting group by store_id

select store_id, storename, tel, address, lineintro, intro, SUBSTR(image, 1, INSTR(image, ' ') - 1) as image, main_menu, main_image, region_name, feature, dessert from registration where region_name = #{param1}

select store_id, storename, tel, address, lineintro, intro, SUBSTR(image, 1, INSTR(image, ' ') - 1) as image, main_menu, main_image, region_name, feature, dessert from registration where dessert like '%' || #{param1} || '%'
